a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: GDP per capita vs. electoral democracy index, 2022
GDP per capita is adjusted for inflation and for differences in the cost of living between countries. Electoral
democracy based on the expert estimates and index by V-Dem, ranging from 0 to 1 (most democratic).
Data source: Bolt and van Zanden - Maddison Project Database 2023; V-Dem (2024)
Note: GDP per capita is expressed in international-$ at 2011 prices.
